dc_description_s: Tax Increment Financing (TIF) locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of TIF areasC. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. A database provided by the Office of the Chief Financial Officer identified TIF area locations. The dataset is a result of research conducted on the DC Official Code Site. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
dct_spatial_sm: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
dc_title_s: Tax Increment Financing (TIF) areas: Washington, D.C.
